game.name: AnimalFruitTart
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Simple controls, just jump! A one-button, physics-based intuitive action game! Wake up your sleeping companions, gather them together, and time it right to open the gate! Use unique abilities and gimmicks to aim for the highest score!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Simple controls, just jump! A one-button, physics-based intuitive action game! Wake up your sleeping companions, gather them together, and time it right to open the gate! Use unique abilities and gimmicks to aim for the highest score!
